content: **this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf** sometimes when it comes to wedding accessories a simple choker can add so much to the over-all look this lacy bridal choker pattern is elegant without being over done and the best part is that you can crochet it in an evening weave the ribbon tie through in the color of your choice to either match the crochet thread used or to match the bridesmaids dresses **difficulty ** intermediate **materials needed ** 1 5mm steel hook or hook needed to obtain gauge approx 50 yards #10 crochet thread scissors yarn needle 1 yard of ¼ ribbon fray check or clear nail polish **stitches used ** slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain= chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet **additional terms ** 3 double_crochet cluster this is basically a dc3tog in the same stitch yo pull up a loop pull through two loops leaving 2 loops on your hook yo pull up a loop pull through 2 loops leaving 3 loops on your hook yo pull up a loop pull through 2 loops leaving 4 loops on your hook yo then pull through all 4 loops **gauge ** 24 stitches in 3 **measurements ** 11 long the average woman s neck circumference is 13 5 around **additional notes ** you will need to know the person s neck circumference that you are making this for before cutting the ribbon down chain 1 does not count as a stitch in this pattern
